headline: Barclays Remains Bullish on Micron Technology (MU) Amid Continued AI Momentum
summary: Micron Technology, Inc. (NASDAQ:MU) is included in our list of the 10 Goldman Sachs undervalued stocks to invest in. On January 15, 2026, Barclays analyst Tom O’Malley increased the firm’s price target on Micron Technology, Inc. (NASDAQ:MU) from $275.00 to $450.00, while reiterating an ‘Overweight’ rating. The update came as part of the firm’s 2026 […]

headline: This Week In AI Chips - Innovative Cooling Solutions Fuel Next-Gen AI Data Centers
summary: Motivair by Schneider Electric has unveiled the MCDU-70, a cutting-edge 2.5MW Coolant Distribution Unit (CDU), designed to address the cooling needs of next-generation AI data centers. This new CDU model supports scalability up to 10MW and is engineered to handle the intense heat generated by advanced GPUs, which power AI Factories. By integrating with Schneider Electric’s EcoStruxure software, the unit promises reliable and efficient cooling solutions for high-density data centers at a...

headline: Why Is Micron (MU) Stock Soaring Today
summary: Shares of memory chips maker Micron (NYSE:MU) jumped 5.9% in the afternoon session after analysts at multiple firms, including Barclays, Stifel, and TD Cowen, raised their price targets on the stock, citing strong demand for its AI-related memory chips.

content.title: Why Is Micron (MU) Stock Soaring Today
content.summary: Shares of memory chips maker Micron (NYSE:MU) jumped 5.9% in the afternoon session after analysts at multiple firms, including Barclays, Stifel, and TD Cowen, raised their price targets on the stock, citing strong demand for its AI-related memory chips.

headline: Stocks to Watch Wednesday: Netflix, Schwab, J&J, United Airlines
summary: ↘️ Netflix (NFLX): The streaming company posted better-than-expected quarterly results, but its cash flow and outlook disappointed, as did the news that it would pause buybacks. The stock dropped 4%. ↗️ARM Holdings (ARM): The chip design firm's stock rose 6% after shares were upgraded by Susquehanna.

headline: Why AppLovin (APP) Stock Is Nosediving
summary: Shares of mobile app technology company AppLovin (NASDAQ:APP) fell 5.6% in the afternoon session after a scathing report from short-seller CapitalWatch alleged the software firm had become a "safe haven" for illicit funds and had ties to a global money laundering syndicate.

content.title: Why AppLovin (APP) Stock Is Nosediving
content.summary: Shares of mobile app technology company AppLovin (NASDAQ:APP) fell 5.6% in the afternoon session after a scathing report from short-seller CapitalWatch alleged the software firm had become a "safe haven" for illicit funds and had ties to a global money laundering syndicate.
